skels.name: durandal-node
skels.description: A Durandal skeleton project with a basic navigation-style architecture pre-configured, an Express server with Handlebars server views, and Bower integration.
skels.author: BlueSpire

skels.name: durandal
skels.description: A Durandal skeleton project with a basic navigation-style architecture pre-configured.
skels.author: BlueSpire

skels.name: ember-peepcode
skels.description: A port of the Peepcode Ember.js app to Mimosa. Uses Emblem for templates, Foundation, Stylus and CoffeeScript on the client. Bower for asset management. Testem and QUnit for testing, with Express/Jade on the server.
skels.author: breathe

skels.name: ember-commonjs
skels.description: A starter app for Ember.js using browserify to perform bundling of assets.
skels.author: JonET

skels.name: ember-bootstrap
skels.description: Mimosa-Skeleton for EmberJS, Bootstrap, Font-Awesome, Jade, Emblem, Less and Express-Apps.
skels.author: Anachron

skels.name: browserify-basic
skels.description: A basic 'mimosa new' app but assembled using browserify and commonjs instead of AMD/RequireJS
skels.author: JonET

skels.name: backbone-topcoat
skels.description: A simple starter skeleton for building a Mimosa module using Backbone and Topcoat
skels.author: mftaher

skels.name: angular-node
skels.description: Node and Angular skeleton using Coffeescript and featuring live-reload, bootstrap integration, profiles, mimosa-bower config, and mimosa-combine
skels.author: kevin-buttercoin

skels.name: zappa-basic
skels.description: A 'mimosa new' basic app, but with a Zappa server instead of Express.
skels.author: dbashford

skels.name: ui-component
skels.description: A starter app for developing and packaging reusable UI components using RequireJS. Utilizes Bower for package management and Testem, Mocha and Chai for testing component behavior. Written in CoffeeScript, but Mimosa handles any language.
skels.author: dbashford

skels.name: mimosa-module-javascript
skels.description: A simple starter skeleton for building a Mimosa module using JavaScript
skels.author: dbashford

skels.name: mimosa-module-coffeescript
skels.description: A simple starter skeleton for building a Mimosa module using CoffeeScript
skels.author: dbashford

skels.name: mimosa-module-coffeescript-bare
skels.description: A starter skeleton for building a Mimosa module using CoffeeScript, but without docs/comments to remove.
skels.author: dbashford

skels.name: minimal
skels.description: Super-minimal Mimosa template for your super-quick hacks. Single index.jade, main.coffee and style.styl without any extra baggage.
skels.author: lachenmayer

skels.name: minimal-foundation
skels.description: A skeleton with basic Foundation integration (only CSS) and Foundation intro template page.
skels.author: xixixao
